title: Maintain CRAR >= 12%
description: Bank must maintain Capital to Risk-weighted Assets Ratio of at least 12% at all times, comprising Tier 1 and Tier 2 capital relative to total risk-weighted assets.

tierEnhancements.TIER_4: Plus Capital Conservation Buffer of 2.5% and Pillar 3 disclosures

title: Tier 1 Capital Minimum of 6%
description: Maintain minimum Tier 1 capital of 6% of risk-weighted assets, ensuring adequate core capital for loss absorption.

title: Common Equity Tier 1 (CET1) Minimum 3.5%
description: Maintain minimum CET1 capital of 3.5% of risk-weighted assets, representing the highest quality capital.

title: Capital Conservation Buffer
description: Build and maintain capital conservation buffer above minimum CRAR as per UCB tier classification.

tierEnhancements.TIER_3: CCB of 2.5% mandatory above minimum CRAR
tierEnhancements.TIER_4: CCB of 2.5% mandatory with distribution restrictions if breached

title: Tier 2 Capital Limit Compliance
description: Ensure Tier 2 capital does not exceed the prescribed limit relative to Tier 1 capital.

title: Annual Capital Plan
description: Prepare and implement Board-approved capital plan ensuring adequate capital for current and projected business activities.

title: Credit Risk Capital Charge — Standardized Approach
description: Calculate credit risk capital using standardized approach with appropriate risk weights for various asset classes.

title: Market Risk Capital Charge
description: Compute and maintain adequate capital charge for market risk on trading book exposures.

title: Operational Risk Capital Charge
description: Assess operational risk capital using basic indicator approach based on gross income.

title: CRAR Reporting to RBI via DAKSH
description: Submit Capital to Risk-weighted Assets Ratio returns to RBI through DAKSH platform on schedule.

title: Pillar 3 Public Disclosures
description: Make Pillar 3 disclosures on capital adequacy, risk exposures, and risk assessment processes on bank website.

tierEnhancements.TIER_4: Full Basel III Pillar 3 disclosure template required

title: Basel III Supervisory Returns
description: Submit all Basel III supervisory returns as per RBI format through DAKSH platform.

title: NPA Classification — Sub-Standard Assets
description: Classify assets as sub-standard when they remain NPA for a period not exceeding 12 months.

title: NPA Classification — Doubtful Assets
description: Classify assets as doubtful when they remain in sub-standard category for more than 12 months.

title: NPA Classification — Loss Assets
description: Classify assets as loss when identified as uncollectable by internal or external audit or RBI inspection.

title: Provisioning for Sub-Standard Assets
description: Maintain 15% provision on total outstanding for sub-standard secured assets and 25% for unsecured.

title: Provisioning for Doubtful Assets
description: Maintain 100% provision on unsecured portion and graded provision (25-100%) on secured portion based on ageing.

title: Provision Coverage Ratio Monitoring
description: Maintain adequate provision coverage ratio against NPAs and report to Board quarterly.

title: Income Recognition — NPA Interest Reversal
description: Reverse interest income already charged to profit and loss on accounts classified as NPA.

title: NPA Return Filing to RBI
description: Submit NPA returns including asset classification and provisioning details through DAKSH.

title: Restructuring of Advances
description: Follow RBI norms for restructuring of advances including asset classification during and after restructuring.

title: Wilful Defaulter Identification
description: Identify and report wilful defaulters as per RBI framework including Board-level review.

title: Write-Off Policy and Execution
description: Implement Board-approved write-off policy for irrecoverable NPA accounts with proper documentation.

title: Credit Risk Assessment Framework
description: Conduct comprehensive credit risk assessment for borrowers including financial analysis, security assessment, and internal rating.

title: Large Exposure Monitoring
description: Monitor and limit single borrower exposure to 25% and group exposure to 55% of eligible capital.

tierEnhancements.TIER_4: Basel III large exposure framework compliance required

title: Sectoral Exposure Limits
description: Monitor exposure to individual sectors and ensure concentration risk is within Board-approved limits.

title: Collateral Valuation and Monitoring
description: Ensure periodic revaluation of collateral securities and maintain loan-to-value ratios within norms.

title: Customer Identification — Individual Accounts
description: Verify identity and address of individual customers using officially valid documents (OVDs) at account opening.

title: Customer Identification — Non-Individual Accounts
description: Verify beneficial ownership and control structure for non-individual accounts including trusts, companies, partnerships.

title: Customer Risk Categorization
description: Categorize customers into low, medium, and high risk based on nature of business, transaction volumes, and geographic location.

tierEnhancements.TIER_3: Enhanced CDD for high-risk customers including senior management approval
tierEnhancements.TIER_4: Enhanced CDD with automated risk scoring system required

title: Periodic KYC Updation
description: Update KYC records periodically — high risk every 2 years, medium risk every 8 years, low risk every 10 years.

title: Suspicious Transaction Reporting (STR)
description: Report suspicious transactions to FIU-IND within prescribed timelines as per PMLA requirements.

title: Cash Transaction Reporting (CTR)
description: Report all cash transactions exceeding Rs. 10 lakh and integrally connected cash transactions to FIU-IND.

title: Principal Officer Designation
description: Designate Principal Officer and Deputy Principal Officer for AML compliance reporting to FIU-IND.

title: AML/CFT Training Program
description: Conduct regular training for staff on AML/CFT obligations, suspicious transaction identification, and reporting procedures.

title: Record Keeping — Transaction Records
description: Maintain records of all transactions for minimum 5 years from the date of transaction as per PMLA.

title: Correspondent Banking Due Diligence
description: Conduct enhanced due diligence for correspondent banking relationships including shell bank checks.

title: Overall PSL Target — 75% of ANBC
description: Achieve priority sector lending target of 75% of Adjusted Net Bank Credit (or credit equivalent of Off-Balance Sheet Exposure, whichever is higher).

title: Micro Enterprise Lending Sub-Target
description: Achieve sub-target for lending to micro enterprises within the overall PSL target.

title: Weaker Section Lending Sub-Target
description: Achieve sub-target for lending to weaker sections as prescribed by RBI.

title: PSL Classification Accuracy
description: Ensure all loans classified as priority sector meet RBI classification criteria for the respective category.

title: PSL Non-Achievement Penalty — RIDF Deposit
description: In case of PSL shortfall, deposit required amount with NABARD under RIDF or other designated funds.

title: PSL Reporting to RBI
description: Submit quarterly PSL returns to RBI showing achievement against targets and sub-targets.

title: Housing Loan Classification
description: Ensure housing loans up to specified limits qualify under priority sector with proper documentation.

title: Education Loan Classification
description: Ensure education loans up to Rs. 20 lakh qualify under priority sector lending.

title: Loan Policy — Board Approved
description: Maintain comprehensive Board-approved loan policy covering all aspects of credit management and reviewed annually.

title: Single Borrower Exposure Limit — 25%
description: Ensure single borrower exposure does not exceed 25% of eligible capital base.

tierEnhancements.TIER_4: Basel III large exposure framework full compliance

title: Group Borrower Exposure Limit — 55%
description: Ensure group borrower exposure does not exceed 55% of eligible capital base.

title: Director-Related Lending Restrictions
description: Comply with restrictions on loans to directors and their relatives including disclosure and reporting requirements.

title: Unsecured Advances Limit
description: Ensure unsecured advances do not exceed 10% of total assets as per RBI ceiling.

title: Gold Loan Management
description: Comply with RBI norms for gold loans including LTV cap of 75%, safe custody of ornaments, and documentation.

title: Housing Loan LTV Compliance
description: Maintain Loan-to-Value ratios within prescribed limits for housing loans (75-90% depending on loan amount).

title: Credit Monitoring and Review
description: Establish credit monitoring system for early warning signals and periodic review of loan accounts.

title: Large Exposure Reporting to RBI
description: Report large exposures exceeding 10% of eligible capital to RBI on quarterly basis.

title: Consortium and Multiple Banking Arrangements
description: Follow RBI guidelines for consortium lending and multiple banking arrangements including information sharing.

title: Lending to Nominal Members
description: Ensure lending to nominal members complies with RBI restrictions and does not exceed 10% of total advances.

title: Area of Operation Compliance
description: Ensure lending operations remain within bank's registered area of operation as approved by RBI/RCS.

title: Board Composition — Fit and Proper Criteria
description: Ensure all directors meet fit and proper criteria including educational qualifications, experience, and no disqualifications.

title: Mandatory Board Committees
description: Constitute mandatory committees: Audit Committee, Risk Management Committee, and Nomination Committee.

tierEnhancements.TIER_3: RMC mandatory with independent members and quarterly reporting
tierEnhancements.TIER_4: Full committee structure including Remuneration Committee

title: Audit Committee Functioning
description: Maintain functioning Audit Committee meeting quarterly with review of internal audit findings and controls.

title: Related Party Transactions Policy
description: Implement Board-approved policy for identifying, approving, and disclosing related party transactions.

title: Internal Audit Function
description: Maintain independent internal audit function covering all areas of operations with adequate frequency and reporting.

title: Risk Management Framework
description: Establish comprehensive risk management policy covering credit, market, and operational risks with Board oversight.

title: Risk Appetite Framework
description: Document and implement risk appetite statement approved by Board defining acceptable risk levels and limits.

title: Compliance Culture and Reporting
description: Establish compliance culture with designated compliance officer reporting to Board on regulatory compliance status.

title: Financial Statements Disclosures
description: Ensure comprehensive disclosures in annual financial statements as per RBI prescribed format.

title: Customer Grievance Redressal
description: Maintain customer grievance redressal mechanism with Board oversight and participation in RBI Ombudsman Scheme.

title: Fraud Risk Management Policy
description: Establish Board-approved fraud risk management policy covering fraud prevention, detection, investigation, and reporting.

title: Fraud Reporting to RBI
description: Report fraud cases to RBI within prescribed timelines based on fraud amount thresholds.

tierEnhancements.TIER_3: CEO-level reporting to Board for all frauds above Rs. 1 crore
tierEnhancements.TIER_4: Board-level reporting for all frauds with quarterly trend analysis

title: Fraud Investigation Mechanism
description: Establish mechanism for investigating fraud cases including designated investigation officer and process.

title: Staff Accountability for Fraud
description: Implement framework for fixing staff accountability in fraud cases including departmental action.

title: Fraud Prevention Measures
description: Implement preventive measures including maker-checker, concurrent audit, staff rotation, and surprise inspections.

title: Early Warning Signals Monitoring
description: Monitor early warning signals for potential fraud including unusual transactions, override patterns, and anomalies.

title: Whistle-Blower Mechanism
description: Maintain whistle-blower mechanism for employees and stakeholders to report suspected fraud confidentially.

title: Quarterly Fraud Review by Board
description: Present quarterly review of fraud cases, investigation status, and preventive actions to the Board.

title: Board-Approved Cyber Security Policy
description: Establish and implement comprehensive cyber security policy approved by Board with annual review.

title: CISO Appointment
description: Appoint Chief Information Security Officer responsible for information security governance and implementation.

tierEnhancements.TIER_1: CISO function may be combined with another role
tierEnhancements.TIER_4: Dedicated CISO with independent reporting mandatory

title: Cyber Security Incident Reporting to RBI
description: Report cyber security incidents to RBI-CERT within 6 hours of detection for critical incidents.

title: Business Continuity Plan and DR
description: Maintain tested Business Continuity Plan with disaster recovery site and annual DR drill.

title: IT Governance Framework
description: Implement IT governance framework including IT strategy, IT policy, and IT steering committee.

title: Information Security Audit
description: Conduct annual information security audit by CERT-IN empaneled auditor.

title: Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing
description: Conduct VAPT at least annually and after significant system changes.

title: Cyber Security Awareness Training
description: Conduct regular cyber security awareness training for all staff members and Board.

title: Security Operations Center
description: Establish or subscribe to Security Operations Center for continuous monitoring of cyber threats.

tierEnhancements.TIER_4: Dedicated 24x7 SOC mandatory with SIEM integration

title: Data Loss Prevention
description: Implement data loss prevention controls to protect sensitive customer and financial data.

title: Access Control and Identity Management
description: Implement role-based access control, strong authentication, and privileged access management.

title: Network Security and Segmentation
description: Implement network security controls including firewall, IDS/IPS, network segmentation, and encrypted communication.

title: Interest Rate Policy — Board Approved
description: Maintain Board-approved interest rate policy for deposits and advances with periodic review.

title: ALCO Constitution and Monthly Meetings
description: Constitute Asset Liability Committee with monthly meetings to review interest rate positions and liquidity.

title: ALM Gap Analysis
description: Conduct Asset Liability Management gap analysis to manage interest rate risk in banking book.

title: Liquidity Coverage Ratio Monitoring
description: Maintain adequate liquidity through LCR monitoring and contingency funding plan.

title: Deposit Rate Compliance
description: Ensure deposit interest rates comply with RBI ceilings and do not offer rates above prescribed limits.

title: ALM Reporting to RBI
description: Submit ALM returns to RBI including gap analysis and liquidity position through DAKSH.

title: Investment Policy — Board Approved
description: Maintain Board-approved investment policy covering permitted instruments, limits, and risk management.

title: SLR Maintenance
description: Maintain Statutory Liquidity Ratio at prescribed minimum (currently 18%) in approved government securities.

title: HTM/AFS/HFT Classification
description: Classify investment portfolio into Held to Maturity, Available for Sale, and Held for Trading categories as per RBI norms.

tierEnhancements.TIER_4: Full HTM/AFS/HFT classification with quarterly Board reporting

title: Mark-to-Market Valuation
description: Mark AFS and HFT portfolios to market at prescribed frequency and account for depreciation.

tierEnhancements.TIER_3: Monthly MTM mandatory with P&L impact reporting
tierEnhancements.TIER_4: Weekly MTM with full fair value accounting

title: Non-SLR Investment Limits
description: Ensure non-SLR investments do not exceed prescribed limits and comply with quality and rating requirements.

title: Dealing Room Operations
description: Maintain proper dealing room operations with front-office, back-office, and mid-office segregation.

title: Investment Depreciation Provision
description: Maintain investment fluctuation reserve and depreciation provision as per RBI norms.

title: Prohibited Investments Compliance
description: Ensure bank does not invest in prohibited instruments including equity shares, units of equity mutual funds beyond limits.

title: Investment Transaction Reporting
description: Report investment transactions including purchase, sale, and maturity through prescribed returns.

title: Risk-Based Supervision Return — Investments
description: Submit investment-related data in RBS returns including portfolio composition and risk assessment.
